CustomField.description: Write the title of the notification. This field support merge fields for user object. Example: {!User.Field__c} messages with values larger than 250 characters will be truncated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Write the title of the notification. This field support merge fields for user object. Example: {!User.Field__c} messages with values larger than 250 characters will be truncated.
CustomField.label: Title
